    Introduction to Robotics Workshop

    14 March 2012

    Teatro ABC.PI invited us to give a one day "Introduction to Robotics" workshop at "Ponto de Encontro" in Cacilhas (Almada), and the good news is that it is totally free, the not so good news is that you need to hurry up because there is a limitation to 15 participants. This is an initiative of "Quinzena da Juventude" and "Camara de Almada".

    Read the full post

    Magabot interacting with person, by Francisco Dias

    27 January 2012

    Magabot is becoming more and more interactive, this time Francisco Dias wanted to add more complexity to the bot, by using a Kinect the bot really knows that there is a person there, and can act accordingly.

    In the next episode Magabot will have a face and will be able to speak and listen to commands!

    Read the full post

    ICU2, almost there

    26 January 2012

    ICU2 is going to Pavilh√£o do Conhecimento in February and we are finishing the hardware and software. Some servos needed to be swapped and I needed to print a suport for a standard servo, this video shows a bit of the printing process and the printed thing assembled.

    There will me more updates very soon.

    Artica Showreel 2011

    06 January 2012

    2011 will always be a very special year for us!!

    We began this insane new adventure in our lifes called: ARTICA Creative Computing! It has been an amazing journey and growing process. Every person we have met, every project and sleepless hours payed back and we could not be happier with the result!

    And because we could not have done it without all of you here is a sum up of last year projects:

    Telepresence with Magabot and Google Chat

    04 January 2012

    Remote control using Google Chat is the latest development in our App toolkit, "online chat is no longer what it was", is one of the premises beyond Magabot project.

    Link to +Gmail page featuring this video.
